pullRequest.title: Add TableMetadata.updateSortOrder
pullRequest.bodyText: This adds a method to update a TableMetadata with a new SortOrder. There is no operation that uses this, but it can be used directly for testing.

nodes.bodyText: Could this cause a problem if I have a table that goes unsorted -> sorted 1,2,3 -> unsorted -> sorted 4,5,6?  Wouldn't the ids then go 0 -> 1 -> 0 -> 1, where we have two separate sort orders with the id 1?
